channel.title: Washing on YourBizMiner
channel.description: Recent content in Washing on YourBizMiner

item.title: How To Wash A Baja Hoodie
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water Add a small amount of detergent Place the hoodie in the water Gently agitate the water Rinse the hoodie in cold water Hang the hoodie to dry Do Baja hoodies shrink in the wash?? Do people still wear Baja hoodies? There is a reason why the Baja Hoodie is still a popular fashion item.

item.title: How To Wash A Bandana
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water. Add a small amount of detergent. Soak the bandana in the water for about 10 minutes. Rinse the bandana in cold water. Squeeze the excess water out of the bandana. Lay the bandana out on a towel. Roll the towel up and squeeze the towel to remove the excess water.

item.title: How To Wash A Bath Pillow
item.description: Best Answer Fill a tub with warm water and add a few drops of dish soap. Place the pillow in the tub and let it soak for a few minutes. Gently scrub the pillow with a sponge. Rinse the pillow with clean water. Squeeze the pillow to remove excess water. Place the pillow in a dryer on low heat for 10 minutes.

item.title: How To Wash A Beret
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cool water and add a small amount of mild detergent. Place the beret in the water and allow it to soak for a few minutes. Gently squeeze the beret to remove excess water. Rinse the beret in cool water. Gently squeeze the beret to remove excess water. Lay the beret on a towel and pat it dry.

item.title: How To Wash A Binder
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water Add a small amount of detergent Place the binder in the water Agitate the binder in the water Rinse the binder in cold water Hang the binder to dry Can you put a binder in the washing machine?? Do binders shrink in the wash? NO! Binders are made of elastic and spandex.

item.title: How To Wash A Bomber Jacket
item.description: Best Answer Fill a bucket with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Submerge the jacket in the bucket and let it soak for a few minutes. Remove the jacket from the bucket and rinse it with cold water. Fill the bucket with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Submerge the jacket in the bucket and let it soak for a few minutes.

item.title: How To Wash A Bonnet
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water. Add a small amount of shampoo to the water. Place the bonnet in the water and allow it to soak for a few minutes. Gently squeeze the water out of the bonnet. Rinse the bonnet with cold water. Squeeze the water out of the bonnet. Fill the sink with cold water.

item.title: How To Wash A Bra From Victoria'S Secret
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water and add a few drops of mild detergent. Place the bra in the water and allow it to soak for a few minutes. Gently squeeze the bra to remove excess water. Rinse the bra in cold water. Gently squeeze the bra to remove excess water. Lay the bra flat on a towel and allow it to air dry.

item.title: How To Wash A Cat Joke
item.description: Best Answer Put the cat in the sink Wet the cat Put soap on the cat Rinse the cat Dry the cat Put the cat back in the house How do you give a cat a bath story?? Are baths traumatizing for cats? Cats and water rarely go together with ease. And trying to submerge them into a tub without researching beforehand can result in trauma for both you and your pet.

item.title: How To Wash A Chest Binder
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water and add a few drops of mild soap. Place the binder in the water and let it soak for a few minutes. Gently scrub the binder with a sponge or cloth. Rinse the binder in cold water. Hang the binder to dry. Can you machine wash a chest binder?? How often should you wash your chest binder?

item.title: How To Wash A Chilipad
item.description: Best Answer Turn off the power to the pad Remove the pad from the bed Remove the cover Remove the pad from the cover Wash the pad in cold water with a mild detergent Rinse the pad Place the pad in the dryer on low heat Place the cover on the pad Turn on the power to the pad

item.title: How To Wash A Cooling Towel
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Place the cooling towel in the sink and let it soak for a few minutes. Rinse the cooling towel with cold water. Squeeze the excess water out of the cooling towel. Hang the cooling towel to dry. Can you machine wash cold towels?

item.title: How To Wash A Corset
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water and add a few drops of mild detergent. Place the corset in the water and allow it to soak for a few minutes. Gently scrub the corset with a soft brush. Rinse the corset in cold water. Fill a sink with cold water and add a few drops of mild detergent.

item.title: How To Wash A Corset Top
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water and add a few drops of mild detergent. Place the corset top in the water and let it soak for a few minutes. Gently scrub the corset top with a soft brush. Rinse the corset top in cold water. Lay the corset top on a towel and pat it dry. Hang the corset top to dry.

item.title: How To Wash A Cup Dirty Joke
item.description: Best Answer Fill the cup with water Put the cup in the dishwasher Run the dishwasher Fill the cup with water Put the cup in the dishwasher Run the dishwasher Can you put a corset top in the washing machine?? How do you clean a smelly corset? After taking off your corset, thoroughly spray the inside with rubbing alcohol before you air out your corset.

item.title: How To Wash A Durag
item.description: Best Answer Fill a bucket with warm water and add a few drops of shampoo. Put the durag in the bucket and let it soak for a few minutes. Rinse the durag with warm water. Squeeze the durag to remove excess water. Lay the durag on a towel and pat it dry. Hang the durag to dry.

item.title: How To Wash A Faja
item.description: Best Answer Fill a tub with warm water and add a few drops of mild soap. Place the faja in the tub and gently scrub it with a soft cloth. Rinse the faja in the tub and then hang it to dry. How often do you wash your faja?? How do you shrink a faja? The only way it will shrink is if you were to place the faja in a dryer, (which you should not do) because of its latex components.

item.title: How To Wash A Futon Mattress
item.description: Best Answer Remove the mattress from the frame. Place the mattress on the ground. Use a vacuum cleaner to remove any dirt and dust from the mattress. Fill a bucket with water and add a few drops of dish soap. Soak the mattress with the soapy water. Use a scrub brush to scrub the mattress. Rinse the mattress with clean water.

item.title: How To Wash A Grand Trunk Hammock
item.description: Best Answer Fill a bucket with water and add a few drops of dish soap. Soak the hammock in the bucket for a few minutes. Rinse the hammock with water. Hang the hammock to dry. Can I wash my hammock in the washing machine?? Can you wash a cotton hammock? Many hammocks can be washed in a washing machine.

item.title: How To Wash A Gua Sha
item.description: Best Answer Fill a bowl with water and add a few drops of dish soap. Place the gua sha tool in the bowl and scrub the surface of the gua sha tool with the soap. Rinse the gua sha tool with water and dry it with a towel. Place the gua sha tool in a dry place. Should I clean my gua sha?

item.title: How To Wash A Harley Davidson
item.description: Best Answer Clean the bike with a soft cloth and water Use a hose to rinse the bike Dry the bike with a soft cloth Apply a coat of wax to the bike What do you wash a Harley with?? Is it safe to wash motorcycle at car wash? High pressure is really the biggest threat to washing a bike in a carwash, because it can cause damage to your bike’s internals and exterior depending on the amount of pressure used.

item.title: How To Wash A Harley Davidson Motorcycle
item.description: Best Answer Clean the bike with a damp cloth Use a hose to rinse the bike Use a bucket of water and a sponge to wash the bike Use a hose to rinse the bike Use a bucket of water and a sponge to wash the bike Use a hose to rinse the bike Use a bucket of water and a sponge to wash the bike Use a hose to rinse the bike Use a bucket of water and a sponge to wash the bike Use a hose to rinse the bike Use a bucket of water and a sponge to wash the bike Use a hose to rinse the bike Use What should I wash my Harley with?

item.title: How To Wash A Headband Wig
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with lukewarm water and add a small amount of shampoo. Submerge the wig in the water and gently squeeze the shampoo through the wig. Rinse the wig thoroughly in the water. Fill the sink with lukewarm water and add a small amount of conditioner. Submerge the wig in the water and gently squeeze the conditioner through the wig.

item.title: How To Wash A Horse Without A Hose
item.description: Best Answer Fill a bucket with water Wet the horse with the bucket Rinse the horse with a hose Repeat steps 1-3 Fill a bucket with water Wet the horse with the bucket Rinse the horse with a hose Repeat steps 1-3 How do you bathe a horse without water?? What human shampoo is safe for horses?

item.title: How To Wash A Jellycat
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water and add a few drops of mild detergent. Place the jellycat in the water and gently squeeze the water through the fur. Rinse the jellycat in cold water. Gently squeeze the water out of the fur. Lay the jellycat on a towel and pat it dry. Lay the jellycat on a flat surface and use a hair dryer on a low setting to dry the fur.

item.title: How To Wash A Kilt
item.description: Best Answer Fill a tub with cold water Add a few drops of detergent Soak the kilt in the tub for about 10 minutes Rinse the kilt in cold water Hang the kilt to dry Can you put a kilt in the washing machine?? Can I dry clean a kilt? Some kiltmakers advise against dry cleaning, as in some instances the stuffing may be removed, and if the kilt is pressed incorrectly the results could be disastrous.

item.title: How To Wash A Loungefly Backpack
item.description: Best Answer Fill a bucket with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Place the backpack in the bucket and let it soak for a few minutes. Rinse the backpack with cold water. Fill the bucket with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Place the backpack in the bucket and let it soak for a few minutes.

item.title: How To Wash A Moncler Jacket
item.description: Best Answer Fill a tub with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Place the jacket in the tub and let it soak for a few minutes. Rinse the jacket with cold water. Fill the tub with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Place the jacket in the tub and let it soak for a few minutes.

item.title: How To Wash A Moroccan Rug
item.description: Best Answer Vacuum the rug to remove any dirt or debris. Fill a bucket with warm water and add a few drops of dish soap. Dip a sponge into the soapy water and scrub the rug. Rinse the rug with clean water. Fill the bucket with clean water and rinse the rug again. Fill the bucket with clean water and pour it over the rug.

item.title: How To Wash A Music Hat
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Place the hat in the water and let it soak for a few minutes. Rinse the hat with cold water. Fill the sink with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Place the hat in the water and let it soak for a few minutes.

item.title: How To Wash A Nuna Rava Car Seat
item.description: Best Answer Remove the car seat from the car. Remove the cover from the car seat. Remove the harness from the car seat. Remove the seat pad from the car seat. Wash the car seat cover, harness, and seat pad in the washing machine. Put the car seat cover, harness, and seat pad in the dryer. Put the car seat back in the car.

item.title: How To Wash A Onesie
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water and add a small amount of detergent. Place the onesie in the water and let it soak for a few minutes. Rinse the onesie in cold water. Fill the sink with cold water and add a small amount of detergent. Place the onesie in the water and let it soak for a few minutes.

item.title: How To Wash A Person'S Hair In A Wheelchair
item.description: Best Answer Put a towel around the person’s neck. Wet the person’s hair with a spray bottle. Put shampoo in your hands and lather it up. Rinse the shampoo out of the person’s hair. Put conditioner in your hands and lather it up. Rinse the conditioner out of the person’s hair. Put a towel around the person’s neck.

item.title: How To Wash A Petticoat
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water and add a small amount of detergent. Place the petticoat in the water and let it soak for a few minutes. Rinse the petticoat in cold water. Fill the sink with cold water and add a small amount of detergent. Place the petticoat in the water and let it soak for a few minutes.

item.title: How To Wash A Pocket Pussy
item.description: Best Answer Remove the sleeve from the toy. Fill the sink with warm water and a small amount of gentle soap. Submerge the sleeve in the water and allow it to soak for a few minutes. Gently squeeze the sleeve to remove any excess water. Lay the sleeve on a towel and pat it dry. Allow the sleeve to air dry.

item.title: How To Wash A Pottery Barn Backpack
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with warm water and dish soap. Place the backpack in the sink and scrub the backpack with a sponge. Rinse the backpack with clean water. Hang the backpack to dry. Can you put a Pottery Barn backpack in the washer?? How do I fluff up my petticoat? Clothes dryer If you have a dryer, you can put your petticoat in the dryer (on its own) and run it for a few minutes on a warm, gentle fluffing cycle.

item.title: How To Wash A Reebok Hockey Jersey
item.description: Best Answer Fill a bucket with cold water Add a few drops of detergent Put the jersey in the bucket Gently agitate the jersey in the water Rinse the jersey in cold water Hang the jersey to dry Fill a bucket with cold water Add a few drops of detergent Put the jersey in the bucket

item.title: How To Wash A Satin Bonnet
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with cold water and add a few drops of mild detergent. Place the bonnet in the water and gently swish it around. Rinse the bonnet in cold water. Gently squeeze the water out of the bonnet and lay it flat on a towel. Roll the towel up and gently squeeze the water out of the bonnet.

item.title: How To Wash A Sauna Suit
item.description: Best Answer Fill a tub with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Put the suit in the tub and let it soak for about 10 minutes. Rinse the suit with cold water. Hang the suit to dry. Can you put a sauna suit in the washer?? How much weight do you lose in sauna suit?

item.title: How To Wash A Sauna Vest
item.description: Best Answer Fill a bucket with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Put the vest in the bucket and let it soak for a few minutes. Rinse the vest with cold water. Fill the bucket with cold water and add a few drops of dish soap. Put the vest in the bucket and let it soak for a few minutes.

item.title: How To Wash A Self Tan Mitt
item.description: Best Answer Fill a sink with warm water and a few drops of dish soap. Submerge the mitt in the water and scrub it with your hands. Rinse the mitt in the sink and squeeze out the excess water. Lay the mitt on a towel and pat it dry. Store the mitt in a clean, dry place. How long can you wear a sauna vest?
